meanings.definition: Transfer of two or more items together.
meanings.sent1: During the cotransfers, the books and pencils were moved at the same time.
meanings.sent2: The cotransfers of the boxes and bags made the process more efficient.
meanings.sent3: The cotransfers of the cookies and milk to the table were like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent4: Her cotransfers of thoughts and emotions were evident in her expressive eyes.
meanings.sent5: The cotransfers of power and responsibility were a heavy burden to bear.

meanings.definition: The act of moving something from one place to another simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: The cotransfers of the furniture and appliances were completed in one trip.
meanings.sent2: She coordinated the cotransfers of the files and folders with precision.
meanings.sent3: The cotransfers of the cats and dogs to the new house was quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: His cotransfers of ideas and concepts revolutionized the field of science.
meanings.sent5: The cotransfers of love and kindness brightened up the room.
